mapper.select: SELECT C.BATCH_NO,C.RFID_NO FROM M_CONTRACT_BATCH C WHERE C.CONTRACT_ID=#{condition.contractNo} AND C.UPDATE_STATE!=1 UNION ALL SELECT MB.BATCH_NO,MB.RFID_NO FROM M_CONTRACT_MODIFY_BATCH MB LEFT JOIN M_CONTRACT_MODIFY M ON MB.MODIFY_ID=M.ID WHERE M.CONTRACT_ID=#{condition.contractNo} AND MB.UPDATE_STATE!=1 UNION ALL SELECT RB.BATCH_NO,RB.NEW_RFID_NO AS RFID_NO FROM M_CONTRACT_REPLENISH_BATCH RB LEFT JOIN M_CONTRACT_REPLENISH R ON RB.REPLENISH_ID=R.ID WHERE R.CONTRACT_ID=#{condition.contractNo} AND RB.NEW_RFID_NO IS NOT NULL
